description: Coefficient triangle for certain polynomials (rising powers).
comments: The row polynomials p(n,x) := sum(a(n,m)*x^m,m=0..n) are negative scaled Chebyshev U-polynomials: p(n,x)= -U(n-1,sqrt(x)/2)*(sqrt(x))^(n+1), n >= 1. p(0,x)=0. p(n-1,1/x) appears in the n-th power of the g.f. of Catalan's numbers A000108, c(x): (c(x))^n = p(n-1,1/x)*1 -p(n,1/x)*x*c(x). Cf. Lang reference eqs.(1) and (2).
links: T. Copeland, Addendum to Elliptic Lie Triad
W. Lang, On polynomials related to powers of the generating function of Catalan's numbers, Fib. Quart. 38 (2000) 408-419. Note 1 and Table.
Index entries for sequences related to Chebyshev polynomials.
formula: a(n, m)=0 if n<m; a(0, 0)=0; a(n, m)= ((-1)^(n-m+1))*binomial(m-1, n-m) if n >= 1 and n >= m >=floor(n/2)+1; else 0.
prog: (PARI) tabl(nn) = {for (n=0, nn, for (k=0, n, if ((n==0) || (k < n\2+1), v = 0, v = (-1)^(n-k+1)*binomial(k-1, n-k)); print1(v, ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 14 2016
